feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Journal of Numerical Mathematics

entry.title: Effective highly accurate time integrators for linear Klein–Gordon equations across the scales
entry.summary: Article by Karolina Kropielnicka, Karolina Lademann, Katharina Schratz DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/jnma-2023-0070

entry.title: Optimal complexity of goal-oriented adaptive FEM for nonsymmetric linear elliptic PDEs
entry.summary: Article by Philipp Bringmann, Maximilian Brunner, Dirk Praetorius, Julian Streitberger DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/jnma-2023-0150

entry.title: Stability and error analysis of a semi-implicit scheme for incompressible flows with variable density and viscosity
entry.summary: Article by An Vu, Loic Cappanera DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/jnma-2024-0033

entry.title: Error analysis of virtual element method for the Poisson–Boltzmann equation
entry.summary: Article by Linghan Huang, Shi Shu, Ying Yang DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/jnma-2023-0085
